basics.name: Rehan Ahmad
basics.label: Radiologic Technologist
basics.summary: As a skilled radiologic technologist, I have experience performing a variety of diagnostic imaging exams, including X-rays, CT scans, MRI scans, and ultrasound. I am proficient in operating imaging equipment, positioning patients for optimal imaging, and ensuring the safety and comfort of patients during exams. I have a strong understanding of radiation safety protocols and am committed to delivering high-quality images that aid in accurate diagnoses and treatment planning. Additionally, I possess excellent communication skills and am able to work collaboratively with healthcare teams to provide exceptional patient care.
